messageBody:
Hi Thijs,

I recently answered this question on the JUnit forum on
http://www.jguru.com/. You can find my answer at
http://www.jguru.com/forums/view.jsp?EID=1242983.

Basically, you need to figure out if you are trying to test the
behaviour within your Thread, or the Thread itself. Then you can plan
accordingly.

Cheers,

Steve.
